parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets coef for some action (coef have to be bigger than -1 000 000, anything lower is considered as disabled action).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''setCuratorCoef''' [action,coef]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> action: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> coef: [[Number]] or [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule setCuratorCoef ["Place", 1]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule setCuratorCoef ["Delete", -1e10]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3: Curator]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 25, 2015 - 21:46 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Austin medic|Austin medic]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Possible actions are:
* place
* edit
* delete
* destroy
* group
* synchronize
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
